fields.title: Online Food Ordering and Delivery System
fields.description: An Online Food Ordering and Delivery System is a digital platform that allows customers to browse restaurant menus, place food orders, and have them delivered to their doorstep. It streamlines the process of ordering and managing food delivery services.

fields.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
fields.description: A classic two-player paper-and-pencil game where players take turns marking 'X' and 'O' on a 3x3 grid. The objective is to form a line of three of your symbols horizontally, vertically, or diagonally, before your opponent does.

fields.title: Library Management System
fields.description: A Library Management System is a software application designed to efficiently manage the operations of a library. Its primary purpose is to streamline tasks such as cataloging, tracking book availability, managing user accounts, and handling library resources.
